response.title: Ensure the registration Call to Action (CTA) is prominently displayed and easily accessible on all pages of the website for non-logged-in users.
response.observation: The registration Call to Action (CTA) is accessible through the 'Create Account' option. It's prominently displayed at the top right corner.
response.suggestions: No changes needed as the registration CTA is prominently displayed.

response.title: Ensure the registration area opens in the same tab or window, providing a seamless user experience without redirecting users to a new tab, window, or modal/popup.
response.observation: The registration form opens in the same tab and does not redirect the users to a new tab, window or popup.
response.suggestions: No changes needed as the registration form opens seamlessly in the same tab.

response.title: Ensure the registration page content is straightforward and easy to understand.
response.observation: The registration page content is straightforward and provides clear instructions for each required step in the process.
response.suggestions: No further improvements necessary as the content is clear and comprehensible.

response.title: Ensure that the registration process to maintain user control and awareness.
response.observation: The registration page does not seem to have visual indicators showing steps involved in the registration process.
response.suggestions: Add visual indicators displaying the number of steps and the current step in the registration process to guide users effectively.

response.title: Ensure that the registration process includes easily accessible live help options.
response.observation: The registration page does not provide any instant customer support access like live chat.
response.suggestions: Integrate live chat or instant customer support options to the registration page for better user assistance.

response.title: Review the registration form to confirm it is simple and user-friendly.
response.observation: The registration form is simple, with logically ordered fields and no unnecessary inputs.
response.suggestions: No changes necessary as the form is already simple and user-friendly.

response.title: Review the registration form to confirm that all fields include appropriate hints, guidelines, or examples to demonstrate the expected input.
response.observation: Fields include labels but there are no sample inputs or detailed guidelines.
response.suggestions: Add hint texts and example inputs in fields wherever applicable to guide users better.

response.title: Review the registration form to ensure that fields are designed appropriately.
response.observation: Most fields are designed well with pull-down menus and options. For example, 'Country' and 'Date of birth' fields use drop-down menus.
response.suggestions: No significant changes needed as fields are designed appropriately for ease of input.

response.title: Review the registration form to ensure there is a clear distinction between 'required' and 'optional' fields.
response.observation: Distinction between required and optional fields is not explicitly present.
response.suggestions: Add asterisks or labels to indicate required fields clearly.

response.title: Review the registration form to ensure that all text boxes are appropriately sized for the expected input.
response.observation: All text boxes appear to be sized appropriately for their expected input.
response.suggestions: No changes needed as text box sizes are appropriately designed.

response.title: Ensure that data formats are clearly indicated for input (e.g., dates) and output (e.g., units of values) in the registration form.
response.observation: Data formats for inputs like dates are clearly indicated using drop-down menus.
response.suggestions: No changes necessary as input fields exhibit clear data format indications.

response.title: Ensure that users can complete simple tasks by entering only essential information.
response.observation: The form asks for only essential information to complete the user registration process.
response.suggestions: No changes needed as the form focuses on collecting essential information only.

response.title: Ensure there is a clearly visible password strength indicator.
response.observation: There is no visible password strength indicator present in the password fields.
response.suggestions: Incorporate a password strength indicator to help users create stronger passwords.

response.title: Make sure the website shows clear error messages when fields are filled out incorrectly or incompletely.
response.observation: There are no explicit error messages shown for incorrect or incomplete field entries.
response.suggestions: Implement clear and immediate error messages for incorrect or incomplete inputs to guide users in real-time.
